roleset.name: (cause to) become empty
roleset.note: EMPTY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'empty' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'empty' based on BOLT-6. Verbnet entries 45.4 and 10.3-1. (from empty.01-v)

example.name: empty-v: just transitive
example.text: ``The guys are going for their skis, their stereos, their personal computers,'' said Frank Fitzgerald, who helped others empty their apartments.

example.name: empty-v: container and substance
example.text: The parties are currently negotiating over who would manage the building, which [*T*-3]-1 will be emptied [*-1]of 6,000 employees from Sears' merchandise group, which is moving elsewhere.
example.arg: of 6,000 employees from Sears' merchandise group, which is moving elsewhere

example.name: emptying-n: Arg0, 1
example.text: Crime is somewhat above pre-war levels (if you don't count the discount from Saddam's emptying the jails a year ago).

roleset.name: containing nothing
roleset.note: EMPTY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from empty.01-j)

example.name: empty-j
example.text: As soon as you browbeat us , it instead makes us feel that your hearts are quite empty / timid / hesitant ,
